Sentencas: The further development of solid oxide fuel and electrolysis cells (SOFC/SOEC) strongly relies on research activities dealing with electrode materials.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: Recent studies showed that under operating conditions many perovskite-type oxide electrodes are prone to changes of their surface composition, leading to severe changes of their electrochemical performance.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: This results in a large scatter of data in literature and complicates comparison of materials.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: Moreover, little information is available on the potentially excellent properties of surfaces immediately after preparation, that is, before any degradation by exposure to other gas compositions or temperature changes.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: Here, we introduce in situ impedance spectroscopy during pulsed laser deposition (IPLD) as a new method for electrochemical analysis of mixed ionic and electronic conducting (MIEC) thin films during growth.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: First, this approach can truly reveal the properties of as-prepared MIEC electrode materials, since it avoids any alterations of their surface between preparation and investigation.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: Second, the measurements during growth give information on the thickness dependence of film properties.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: This technique is applied to La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-delta (LSC), one of the most promising SOFC/SOEC oxygen electrode material.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: From the earliest stages of LSC film deposition on yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to a fully grown thin film of 100 nm thickness, data are gained on the oxygen exchange kinetics and the defect chemistry of LSC.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: A remarkable reproducibility is found in repeated film growth experiments, not only for the bulk related chemical capacitance but also for the surface related polarization resistance (+/- 10%).
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: Polarization resistances of as-prepared LSC films are extraordinarily low (2.0 Omega cm(2) in 40 mu bar O-2 at 600 degrees C).
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films

Sentencas: LSC films on YSZ and on La0.95Sr0.05Ga0.95Mg0.05O3-delta (LSGM) single crystals exhibit significantly different electrochemical properties, possibly associated with the tensile strain of LSC on LSGM.
Titulo: In Situ Impedance Analysis of Oxygen Exchange on Growing La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ Thin Films
